gridsim.resFailure
Class FailureMsg

Object
  FailureMsg

public class FailureMsg
extends Object

This class is used by RegionalGISWithFailure to commnunicate with GridResourceWithFailure for simulating a resource failure.

Since:
GridSim Toolkit 4.1
Author:
Agustin Caminero
